result.eng: It was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.html: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ tú idir ḋá ċoṁairle maidir leis an ḟreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.

result.eng: We couldn't leave the house because of the rain.
result.ga: Ní raibh muid ábalta an teach a fhágáil de bharr na báistí
result.orig: Ní raibh muid ábalta an teach a fhágáil de bharr na báistí
result.html: Ní raibh muid ábalta an teach a fhágáil de bharr na báistíWe couldn't leave the house because of the rain.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ muid ábalta an teaċ a ḟágáil de ḃarr na báistíWe couldn't leave the house because of the rain.

result.ga: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linn
result.orig: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linn
result.html: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linnThey couldn't help us.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ siad in ann caḃrú linnThey couldn't help us.

result.eng: They made me an offer I couldn't refuse.
result.ga: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach di
result.orig: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach di
result.html: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach diThey made me an offer I couldn't refuse.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad tairiscint dom nárḃ ḟéidir liom eiteaċ diThey made me an offer I couldn't refuse.

result.eng: I couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.
result.ga: Ní fhéadfainn rud ar bith a chloisint ag sodar an chapaill
result.orig: Ní fhéadfainn rud ar bith a chloisint ag sodar an chapaill
result.html: Ní fhéadfainn rud ar bith a chloisint ag sodar an chapaillI couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḟéadfainn rud ar biṫ a ċloisint ag sodar an ċapaillI couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.

result.eng: She had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ga: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.orig: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.html: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ponchtml: Ġeall sí dó é – ní ḟéadfaḋ sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.

result.eng: She couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ga: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.orig: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.html: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ag dul di ciall a ḃaint as imeaċtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ga: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.orig: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.html: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadhAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ponchtml: Ní ḟéadfaḋ eitleán dul an bealaċ ar fad tríd an ḃfoirgneaṁ an ḃféadfaḋAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: All the children started laughing and couldn't stop.
result.ga: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí
result.orig: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí
result.html: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáiríAll the children started laughing and couldn't stop.
result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ iomlán na bpáistí siocṫa leis na gáiríAll the children started laughing and couldn't stop.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
